com.nokia.lwuit
Class OrientationProvider

java.lang.Object
  com.nokia.lwuit.OrientationProvider

public abstract class OrientationProvider
extends java.lang.Object

wrapper around the nokia Orientation class. The methods in this class are the same as in com.nokia.mid.ui.orientation.Orientation.

Field Summary
static int ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE
          Constant for display and UI orientation mode (Landscape, right side up).
static int ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE_180
          Constant for display orientation mode (Landscape, left side up).
static int ORIENTATION_PORTRAIT
          Constant for display and UI orientation mode (Portrait, top side up).
static int ORIENTATION_PORTRAIT_180
          Constant for display orientation mode (Portrait, bottom side up).

Method Detail

addOrientationListener

public abstract void addOrientationListener(OrientationListener listener)
Registers an orientation listener

Parameters:
listener - the listener to register

getAppOrientation

public abstract int getAppOrientation()
Gets application's current UI orientation.

Returns:
constant value of application's UI orientation.

getDisplayOrientation

public abstract int getDisplayOrientation()
Gets the current display orientation.

Returns:
constant value of display orientation.

removeOrientationListener

public abstract void removeOrientationListener(OrientationListener listener)
Removes and orientation listener.

Parameters:
listener - the listener to remove.

setAppOrientation

public abstract void setAppOrientation(int newAppOrientation)
Sets the application's UI orientation.

Parameters:
newAppOrientation - value of application's new UI orientation. The value must be one of the following: ORIENTATION_PORTRAIT or ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE

getOrientationProvider

public static OrientationProvider getOrientationProvider()
Get and instance of this class. This factorymethod creates and instance if the supported api is available. Otherwise returns null.

Returns:
an instance of OrientationProvider or null if Nokia API is not available.
